author: pipermerriam
content: I realized this morning that re-genesis could simply be done on some sort of epoch boundary and wouldn't need a coordinated hard fork assuming we wanted to do regenesis on a regular cadence. something like every 1 million blocks or if we wanted to get really fancy, once the state grows beyond a certain size (significantly more complex).
